title: Lead front-end engineer
description:
*DBT was founded with the ambition to empower Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs) and entrepreneurs by offering them the financing they need to grow. Since our start in 2017, we have supported over 300 Swedish companies with more than SEK 3 billion in loan financing. Backed by prominent investors such as Öhman, Östersjöstiftelsen, Öresund Investment, and with financing secured by the global banking giant NatWest, we are building the next generation SME lender.*
*Leveraging our proprietary digital platform for lending and analysis, we challenge the traditional financing market, offering an alternative or complement to institutional banks and factoring companies. Recognized by Sifted as a "Nordic Scaleup to Watch" and named one of Europe’s fastest-growing companies by the Financial Times in 2021 and 2023, DBT is a registered financial institution under the supervision of Finansinspektionen and is supported by the European Investment Fund (EIF).*
*We are now seeking a business-oriented and self-motivated* 
***front-end developer***
*with the drive to elevate DBT to new heights. Join us in our mission to provide SMEs with the financing they deserve!*
**About The Role**
 As a Lead front-end developer, you will take charge of the technologies that underpin our digital experiences, both for our colleagues and our outward-facing digital products. You will be responsible for bringing our data to the interactive realm and for evolving and maintaining our world-class proprietary front-end technologies built on principles of simplicity and scalability. You will teach your colleagues how it’s done and be a driving force for excellence in a high-velocity environment.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Building great interfaces: Build snappy world-class user interfaces that bring joy to our users.
* UI framework development: Evolve and maintain the leverage of our UI framework that houses the reusable components that allow us to deliver fast.
* Library stewardship: Ensuring that our shared code meets the structural requirements and standards of open-source libraries used by millions of developers.
* Knowledge sharing: Ensure that the team is continuously sharpened in the fields of your knowledge.


 At DBT, we believe in the power of the team and individuals who align with our mindset and values. We are looking for a Front-end developer with a ”we before me” mentality that performs best in a growing, fast-changing, and dynamic environment. You are a curious self-starter with strong business acumen and an entrepreneurial mindset. As an individual, you possess a commercial and structured mindset, coupled with unwavering commitment and drive.
   

  

**Requirements**
* Mastery of JavaScript and TypeScript, coming from at least 5 years of professional experience.
* Proven track-record of driving solutions. A results-driven mindset with the ability to work independently and proactively in a dynamic, fast-paced environment is crucial.
* An eye for design and aesthetics.
* Exceptional logical and reasoning skills.
* Strong communication and negotiation abilities, with a talent for building relationships with new clients.
* Excellent command of both Swedish and English in all forms of communication.
* Background in financial data or data visualization


 At DBT Capital, we are committed to nurturing a culture that combines hard work, camaraderie, and respect. We empower individuals while offering robust team support, creating an entrepreneurial and challenging environment.
   

  

 We will be interviewing continuously. We are looking forward to receiving your online application. For questions, please contact David Ask at david.ask@dbt.se. Please note that we do not accept applications by e-mail because of data protection under GDPR.
   

  

 Warm welcome with your application!

title: System Developer – Web Platform (Stockholm, hybrid)
description:
Vi söker en erfaren System Developer som vill vara med och bygga samt underhålla den tekniska grunden för flera utvecklingsteam. Du blir en del av vår kunds Web Platform-team och ansvarar för vår monorepo-arkitektur – en central plattform som möjliggör effektiv utveckling och samarbete inom organisationen.
   

  

**Om Rollen**
 Som System Developer kommer du att arbeta med både frontend och backend-for-frontend (BFF), samtidigt som du förbättrar utvecklarupplevelsen genom tydliga API:er, förbättrad dokumentation och effektiva arbetsflöden. Du bidrar till både daglig utveckling och långsiktig teknisk riktning.
   

  

**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Djup kunskap i JavaScript/TypeScript och erfarenhet av React, Next.js och Node.js
* Arbetat i monorepo-miljöer och har erfarenhet av verktyg som Turborepo
* Driv att förbättra utvecklarupplevelsen och stötta andra utvecklare genom tydlig struktur och verktyg
* Förmåga att ta initiativ och leda tekniska förbättringar i en komplex miljö
* Erfarenhet av molnplattformar, gärna Azure
* Vana att arbeta enligt agila metoder


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD och infrastrukturautomatisering
* Fokus på tillgänglighet, skalbarhet och underhållbar kod
* Erfarenhet av att dokumentera, hålla i demos och dela kunskap


**Om Uppdraget**
* Start: Så snart som möjligt
* Plats: Stockholm
* Arbetssätt: Heltid, hybrid


 Detta är ett
 **12-månaders konsultuppdrag** 
 där du blir projektanställd av HIROY. Vi erbjuder ett generöst paket och möjligheten att bli en del av vårt nätverk av experter och byråer.
   

  

 Vill du arbeta med modern teknik i ett centralt team med stor påverkan? Välkommen med din ansökan.
   

  

**Hiroy – Din partner inom Marknad, Kommunikation och Tech**
 Hos Hiroy förstår vi vad som krävs för att hitta rätt kompetens och skapa framgångsrika samarbeten. Genom vår djupa branschkunskap och dagliga dialog med kunder, kandidater och konsulter har vi en unik helhetsbild av marknaden.
   

  

 Som kandidat eller konsult hos oss blir du en del av vårt starka nätverk, där vi matchar dig med spännande uppdrag och rätt möjligheter för din utveckling. Vi kombinerar aktivt sökande av toppkandidater och konsulter med vårt gedigna nätverk av erfarna experter och passiva kandidater. På så sätt säkerställer vi att du får tillgång till de bästa uppdragen – samtidigt som företag snabbt hittar rätt kompetens.
   

  

 Vi håller oss ständigt uppdaterade kring de senaste trenderna, verktygen och utvecklingarna inom branschen. Genom att dela insikter och expertis hjälper vi dig att ligga steget före och skapa långsiktiga resultat i en konkurrensutsatt marknad.
   

  

 Välkommen till Hiroy – låt oss hitta rätt möjligheter tillsammans!

title: Engineering Manager
description:
Trustly is leading the human-centric payments revolution. To us, this means passionately building the most convenient, intelligent and responsible way of paying for things online. Whether it’s for shopping, paying subscriptions, funding trading accounts, booking airfare, playing online games and much more – we’re all about a better way to pay. At our core, we are a tech company with industry-leading tech capabilities. But, it’s the ingenuity of our people that makes us leaders in our field. Thus, our appetite for innovation will never be anything less than fierce. Trustly is steadily growing as it connects thousands of businesses with hundreds of millions of people. And with a strong presence across Europe and the Americas, we are leading the human-centric payment revolution as a truly global team.
 




  





**About the Product & Tech Organisation
 
  






 Our Product & Technology organisation drives the development of Trustly’s products. The cross functional teams collectively work with innovative ideas, development of products and platform and set the vision and strategy for the problem spaces they own. The Product & Tech organisation consists of a bit more than 200 people spread across Stockholm, Lisbon, Örebro, Paris, London and Izmir. 
 




  






 All teams consist of a product manager, an engineering manager, a lead developer and engineers. Some teams also have designers and analytics competence in the team. They all work closely together to enable new products and features within existing products within Europe and to make sure the payment platform runs without interruptions and with high performance.
 




  






 We are now looking to strengthen our engineering capacity within Product & Technology with one more senior position. We operate in an agile culture combined with DevOps, allowing our teams to take on full responsibility from code to on-call.
 




  





**About the Role
 
  






 As an
 
**Engineering Manager
 
 at Trustly, you will play a crucial role in leading and supporting an agile team of talented engineers. Working closely with product managers, lead developers, and other stakeholders, you’ll ensure delivery of high-quality, scalable, and reliable systems while fostering a positive and empowering team culture. This is an excellent opportunity to bridge technical excellence and people management, delivering real impact in the payments industry.
 


  




**What you'll do** 
* **Team Leadership** 
 : Lead, coach, and support a team of engineers, enabling them to perform at their best while fostering a culture of collaboration, ownership, and continuous learning
* **Delivery Excellence** 
 : Drive successful delivery of the team’s commitments, ensuring alignment with domain objectives and product goals
* **Technical Collaboration** 
 : Work hands-on with lead developers and engineers to design, implement, and maintain scalable systems and solutions aligned with Trustly’s technical standards
* **Product Partnership** 
 : Work closely with the product manager to define and prioritise the team’s roadmap, balancing short-term goals with long-term vision
* **Operational Ownership** 
 : Ensure your team’s systems operate reliably in production, with high performance, availability, and maintainability
* **Talent Development** 
 : Recruit, onboard, and mentor engineers, creating an environment where they can grow and thrive
* **Process Improvement** 
 : Advocate for and implement best practices in agile methodologies, DevOps, and engineering processes to continuously improve team effectiveness



  




**Who you are** 
* Proven experience managing engineering teams in agile environments, with a strong focus on team empowerment and delivery
* Hands-on engineering background with expertise in Java and experience in building scalable, robust systems
* Familiarity with modern tech stacks including Kubernetes, Docker, Kafka, and Spring Boot
* Experience working with cloud solutions (preferably AWS), monitoring, and analytics
* Knowledge of service-based architecture and microservices
* Strong ability to balance technical decisions with business needs, ensuring delivery without sacrificing scalability, performance, or reliability
* Committed to fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and excellence
* Passion for DevOps practices and ownership, with a track record of driving improvements in automation and monitoring
* Exceptional communication, problem-solving, and leadership skills
* Fluent in English



  




**At Trustly, you’ll have the opportunity to:** 
* Shape the future of payments as part of a global leader in the industry
* Work with cutting-edge technology and highly skilled colleagues in an agile and collaborative environment
* Take on a role with real impact, where your contributions directly drive the success of your team and Trustly’s mission
* Enjoy a supportive and dynamic culture that encourages growth, innovation, and ownership






  




  


**Our Fantastic Benefits**




 🌴
 **20 to 30 days of holiday** 
 (depending on location) to support a healthy work-life balance
 



 🥳
 **Monthly team outing allowance** 
 to enjoy social events with your colleagues
 



 👶
 **Parental leave top-up** 
 additional support for new parents
 



 🥐
 **Daily breakfast and on-site perks** 
 to make your workday smoother
 



 💚
 **Well being support** 
 our health allowance covers gym memberships, massages, and much more to help you feel your best
 



**PLUS** 
 additional benefits designed to enhance your work-life experience!
 



  





**Shape Your Role and Make an Impact**




 Join a dynamic environment where you can take ownership, drive change, and continuously embrace new challenges. We’re looking for dedicated and highly motivated individuals who thrive in a fast-paced environment and enjoy collaborating across different areas of the organisation.
 



 If your skills and experience align with this role, we’d love to hear from you!
 **Apply now and submit your CV in English.********

title: Data Scientist in Husqvarna Groups new AI org!
company_industry: Mechanical Or Industrial Engineering, Consumer Goods, and Automotive
description:
*Imagine a place where your passion for technology meets the thrill of innovation. Picture yourself as part of a dynamic team, driving tangible business impact - through innovative AI solutions.
 **Welcome to our world!***
**About this opportunity:**
 This is a chance to be part of a team that's passionate about building something meaningful. The thrill of working on research projects that push the boundaries of technology, a collaborative environment where your ideas are valued and your contributions make a real impact. The opportunity to proactively drive the agenda - and
 **shape the future of AI.**
 Here, we are a close-knit team of people working in data, AI and cloud, with colleagues both in India and in Sweden.
 **Our mission?** 
 To scale AI - and pioneer forward-leading technology, ensuring we stay ahead of the curve and deliver impactful solutions.
   

  

**You will:**
 As a Data Scientist, you'll be at the heart of our innovation. You'll dive into data, build models, fine-tune algorithms, and deploy solutions in cloud environments. You'll collaborate with data architects, cloud experts, software developers and other IT specialists, weaving together your expertise - to create something extraordinary.
   

  

* Develop and deliver AI solutions, including data pre-processing, analysis, modelling, deployment, and maintenance.
* Design, install, test, and maintain data management systems, to meet business requirements.
* Implement scripts for database maintenance, deployment, and ETL operations.
* Manage cloud services (AWS, Azure) and relevant cloud storage systems.
* Monitor data performance and modify infrastructure, to improve pipelines and models.
* Document feature lists, user stories, and roadmaps aligned with the product vision.
* Stay updated with technology trends in data science, data engineering, and AI.
* Execute academic and research projects relevant to the AI organization.
* Support ideation processes with technical and entrepreneurial expertise.
* Identify business opportunities through technology-driven innovation.
* Participate in knowledge-sharing activities, to elevate company expertise in AI.


**Who We're Looking For:**
 A great communicator - in the realm of technology. Maybe you’ve started your journey in software development - and found your way into the world of AI. Maybe you've worked in startups (or another innovative environment), where you didn't just code - you pitched ideas, drove innovation, and created solutions that made a
 *difference* 
 . In any environment, you see opportunity in uncertainty, and you like to challenge yourself to learn new areas.
   

  

 Your craftsmanship in writing exceptional code and delivery of high-quality products are your strengths. You're not just a coder; you are also a team-player, a communicator, an innovator, a social person - who knows how to communicate complex concepts effectively to non-technical stakeholders.
   

  

 At Husqvarna, we strive to have a work environment that is inclusive and diverse, where we believe that our differences are our strengths. Therefore, our winning culture is very important to us, which is why we go by the beliefs: We are Bold, We are Dedicated and We Care.
   

  

**Your Skills and Qualifications:**
* A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field and at least 5 years of experience in developing and delivering data and AI solutions, as a Data Scientist, Data Engineer, Software Developer, or similar role. Knowledge of Python, SQL
* Familiarity with big data technologies, like Spark.
* Experience leading and collaborating on cross-functional projects.
* Experience with developing prescriptive solutions to support decision making and experimentation.


**Location:**
 Location for this position is in Sweden at one of our offices in Stockholm,
 **Huskvarna** 
 , or
 **Jonsered (outside Gothenburg).**
 But, with our hybrid working environment, you'll have the flexibility to work both onsite and remotely, promoting work-life balance for all team members. We meet in the office at least 2-3 days a week (50%).
   

  

**Your application:**
 If this sounds like the adventure you’ve been waiting for, we want to hear from you! Apply as soon as possible but no later than 2025-05-30.
 *We apply ongoing selection.*
 For questions regarding the process, please contact Global Talent Acquisition Partner, Matilda Nordén matilda.norden@husqvarnagroup.com.
   

  

**About Husqvarna:**
*Husqvarna Group is a global leader in innovative solutions for managing forests, parks, and gardens, as well as cutting equipment and diamond tools for the light construction and stone industries. With an innovative mindset, we are dedicated to deliver high-quality solutions ranging from robotic mowers to chainsaws, watering systems and power cutters, with a strong focus on our customers and future generations.*
*Founded in the Swedish town Huskvarna in 1689, we have been pioneers in our business for more than three centuries. Today, we are mainly operating under the Husqvarna and Gardena brands, serving consumers and professionals in over 100 countries through direct sales, dealers, and retailers. Headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden, Husqvarna Group employs approximately 13,300 people in 40 countries and reported net sales of SEK 48,4 billion in 2024.* 
*Husqvarna Group is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm.*
**Last date to apply:**
 30 May 2025

title: Lead Software Engineer in Quality Assurance
description:
****Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for a** 
**Lead** 
**Software** 
**Engineer** 
**focused on Quality Assurance** 
**to team up with the most dedicated team of cyber specialists in our Engineering Team.****
**About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**
 Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.
   

  

 Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.
   

  

 Today, we employ around 300 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. To support that goal, we are now looking for a Lead Software Engineer focused on Quality Assurance who wants to make a difference in our Truesec Engineering Team.
   

  

**Truesec Engineering Team**
 Truesec is the Nordic leader in cybersecurity and we’re on a journey to hyper-digitalize the way we prevent breaches and minimize impact from breach. Through a holistic digital experience based on our platform, we’re delivering global managed cybersecurity services. The Truesec engineering mission, enabling a digital Truesec and accelerating the enablement of Managed Services across domains.
   

  

**The role**
 We are looking for a Lead Software Engineer to join our team and play a key role in ensuring the delivery of high-quality software solutions across Truesec's platform and internal tools. This role focuses on designing, implementing, and maintaining robust testing frameworks and processes that ensure the reliability, performance, and security of both user-facing interfaces and backend systems. By collaborating with cross-functional teams, you will help deliver innovative solutions that meet both internal and external needs, supporting Truesec’s long-term goals and success.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a Lead Software Engineer at Truesec, you will:
   

  

* Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders (team members, architects, product managers, designers) to define testing strategies, plan deliverables, and align with agile development goals.
* Design and maintain test environments (e.g., test data generation, backend systems/APIs, CI/CD integration) and build automated testing frameworks for reliable code delivery.
* Implement and optimize end-to-end, performance, and load testing tools (e.g., XUnit, Vitest, Playwright) to validate frontend/backend systems and ensure platform scalability.
* Conduct testing, troubleshoot issues across the stack, and write clean, maintainable code while adhering to best practices and participating in code reviews.
* Document technical specifications, workflows, and architecture designs to promote collaboration and knowledge sharing, while staying updated on QA trends and mentoring team members.


**Experience And Qualifications**
 We are looking for candidates with the following skills and qualifications:
   

  

* Strong understanding of testing principles across frontend and backend systems (functional, integration, regression, performance, security testing) and proficiency with tools like Vitest, Playwright, XUnit, Postman, and performance/security testing frameworks.
* Skilled in frontend (React, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3) and backend technologies (.NET, Python, database systems) with experience of integrating automated testing into CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions).
* Familiarity with Azure cloud technologies, Infrastructure as Code tools (Bicep), and best practices for clean, maintainable, and secure code.
* Ability to troubleshoot and debug across the stack, ensuring reliability, scalability, and security, complemented by strong analytical, problem-solving, and collaboration skills.
* Interest in continuous learning, staying updated on industry trends, and relevant educational background or equivalent practical experience.


***Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.***
**Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future**
 If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you'll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company - and learn from some of the best in their field.
   

  

 So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!

title: Senior Data Analyst to KYC-AML Data Analytics team | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Are you a Senior Data Analyst who wants to create value through data and innovation and is motivated by delivering customer value with high quality? Do you also have a proactive attitude when it comes to continuous improvements and investigating new technologies and concepts and at the same time have experience of building data products in form of models or dashboards? If so, this is probably a position for you!
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 As a Senior Data Analyst, your role is crucial in driving the data architecture strategy across the KYC organization and its stakeholders. We are seeking a highly skilled Data Analyst that can work as a quantitative risk model developer to join our KYC-AML Data Analytics team.
   

  

 This role will focus on enhancing, validating, and maintaining Customer Due Diligence (CDD) models within the scope of the Anti-Money Laundering (AML) directive as well as delivering insights to the key stakeholders with dashboards and adhoc analysis or other data models. Collaboration, communication, and technical expertise are essential in this role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Analyze and Interpret Complex Data Sets: Analyze complex data-related problems, propose well-founded solutions, and drive the work from inception to completion.
* Design and Implement Data Models and Architectures: Ensure data models represent business concepts and requirements, adhere to industry best practices, and support data sharing, governance, and quality initiatives.
* Collaborate with Cross-Functional Teams: Ensure data integrity and security by collaborating with business stakeholders, IT teams, and other cross-functional teams.


**Who We Are Looking For**
 You have a very good understanding of Data frameworks and how to implement it in an efficient way to an organization that is heading into a predominantly Cloud based environment. You are committed to providing high-level service and are a true team player with a strong ability to build relationships with colleagues. You are prestigeless and driven with a can-do attitude.
   

  

 You have a documented track record in working with data and analytics and know what is required to truly leverage it.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Applicants must possess native or professional-level proficiency in Swedish. Applications that do not meet this requirement will not be considered.
* Experience in working with BI tools such as Looker, Tableau, Power BI and data warehouses
* Proficiency in Python (or Scala, Rust, C++, Go, Julia)
* Expertise in data modeling, SQL, and data visualization tools.
* Experience in working with GCP Data Stack, especially BigQuery
* Strong knowledge of model monitoring techniques, performance metrics, and model validation methodologies
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to understand complex business requirements.
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities.
* Having worked in an agile setup.


**Why Join SEB?**
 At SEB, we believe that diversity and inclusion are key to our success. We foster a value-driven culture where employees feel respected, valued, and empowered—no matter their background, beliefs, or identity. We look forward to receiving your application and learning more about how you can contribute to SEB. Welcome with your application!
   

  

**Welcome with your application**
 Attach your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to SEB. Since we meet candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2025-05-18. In case of uncertainty or if you have questions about the position, please, contact Can Kuruca, can.kuruca@seb.se

title: Strategisk utvecklare inom området säker informationsdelning
description:
**Myndigheten för samhällsskydd och beredskap**
 MSB arbetar för ett säkrare samhälle i en föränderlig värld med fokus på utveckling av det civila försvaret. Vi stärker Sveriges förmåga att fungera i kris och till och med krig. Det betyder att alla våra medarbetare bidrar till beredskap och motståndskraft. Från norr till söder sprider vi kunskap och agerar för att skydda liv och hälsa, samhällets funktionalitet och grundläggande värden som demokrati, rättssäkerhet och mänskliga rättigheter. Den 1 januari byter vi namn till Myndigheten för civilt försvar .
   

  

 Har du förmågan att gå från strategisk inriktning till operativ leverans och att se helheten när andra fokuserar på detaljer? Just nu söker vi en strategisk utvecklare inom området säker informationsdelning. Är det du som är vår nästa kollega!
   

  

**Ditt ansvar och dina arbetsuppgifter**
 Som strategisk utvecklare på enheten kommer du tillsammans med andra ansvara för att på strategisk nivå planera och samordna det arbete som sker avseende säker informationsdelning inom totalförsvaret. Du kommer även ansvara för att stödja andra avdelningar och externa parter inom området. Du kommer jobba på en enhet med ansvar för att stödja det civila försvaret att utveckla förmåga att dela och hantera information på ett säkert och robust sätt.
   

  

 I arbetsuppgifterna ingår att:
   

  

* på strategisk nivå bidra till utvecklingen av totalförsvarets förmåga till säker informationsdelning.
* inhämta behov och krav för att realisera dessa genom utveckling av förmåga inom totalförsvaret.
* stödja arbetet med remisser, uppdrag och utredningar inom enheten och avdelningen.
* delta i planering och genomförande av konferenser, övningar samt delta i olika arbetsgrupper internt och extern.
* inspirera och engagera andra aktörer inom totalförsvaret för att driva utvecklingen framåt.


**Dina kunskaper och kompetenser**
 För att söka tjänsten som strategisk utvecklare ser vi att du har en relevant akademisk utbildning eller annan utbildning och erfarenhet som vi bedömer likvärdig. Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av att jobba inom telekom eller med andra it-driftstjänster.
   

  

 Du har erfarenhet av att genomföra utredningar, planering, samordning och uppföljning med en förmåga att tänka strategiskt utifrån olika perspektiv. Du har även en förståelse för hur man går från strategisk inriktning till operativ leverans och åstadkommer en snabb förmågeutveckling. Du har ett stort samhällsintresse och ett intresse för att utveckla totalförsvarets förmåga till säker informationsdelning vid ledning och samverkan. Ditt intresse bidrar till att du vill fortsätta att utvecklas inom området.
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av att stärka och utveckla förmåga till ledning och samverkan.
* Förståelse och erfarenhet av både metoder (t.ex. Gemensamma grunder), organisation och teknik för ledning och samverkan inom totalförsvaret.
* Erfarenhet av att kravställa och implementera tekniska stödsystem för ledning och samverkan inom totalförsvaret.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i en säkerhetskänslig verksamhet där det ställs höga krav på säkerhetsskydd.


 Som alla medarbetare och ledare hos oss förväntas du kunna arbeta uppdragsorienterat, utvecklingsinriktat, dialoginriktat, ha god självkännedom och bidra genom att vara ett föredöme.
   

  

 För att trivas i rollen behöver du vara strukturerad och beredd på att hantera omväxlande arbetsuppgifter. Då arbetet innebär mycket samarbete med andra aktörer inom såväl det civila som det militära försvaret lägger vi stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper. Som person är du samarbetsinriktad och lösningsorienterad. Du tar ansvar för dina uppgifter och driver ditt arbete framåt. För att lyckas med dina åtaganden har du god analytisk förmåga och kan översätta komplex information till praktiska och genomförbara åtgärder. Du känner dig bekväm med och tycker om att tala i både mindre och större forum. Du uttrycker dig väl i tal och skrift.
   

  

**Om anställningen**
 Vi erbjuder dig en anställning tillsvidare på heltid som inleds med en provanställning. Din placeringsort kommer att vara Karlstad eller Stockholm på vårt kontor Tomteboda. Resor i anställningen förekommer.
   

  

 Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav för anställning på MSB då den innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. För anställning krävs godkänt resultat i säkerhetsprövningen med registerkontroll, som genomförs i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Anställningen kommer vara placerad på enheten för säker informationsdelning på verksamheten för stöd till ledning och samverkan. Enheten arbetar för att tillvarata totalförsvarets behov och intressen för säker hantering av information. Enheten gör detta genom att dels stödja totalförsvarets arbete med säker hantering av information för att underlätta ledning och samverkan inom totalförsvaret dels genom att säkerställa skyddet och säker spridning av samhällskritisk information.
   

  

 Alla vi som arbetar på MSB förväntas och ska bidra till ökad jämställdhet och likabehandling för en arbetsmiljö och ett samhälle fritt från diskriminering.
   

  

**Vill du veta mer?**
 Har du frågor är du välkommen att kontakta tf enhetschefSofia Sjölander. Fackliga företrädare är
   

  

 Carl Önne Saco, Jan Herremo ST och Josefin Berglund eller Ann-Britt Paradis SEKO. Samtliga nås via växelnumret 0771-240 240
   

  

**Välkommen med din ansökan senast den 11 maj månad 2025.**
 Det är du som sökande som ska dokumentera och påvisa din kompetens på ett sätt som medger en saklig, kvalitativ bedömning. Du ska också vara medveten om att de ansökningshandlingar som lämnas till MSB är offentliga allmänna handlingar vilket innebär att var och en har rätt att ta del av dem.
   

  

**Anställningsform** 
 Tillsvidare med provanställning
   

  

**Anställningens omfattning** 
 Heltid
   

  

**Tillträde** 
 Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

**Löneform** 
 Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

**Antal lediga befattningar** 
 1
   

  

**Sysselsättningsgrad** 
 100%
   

  

**Ort** 
 Karlstad eller Stockholm
   

  

**Län** 
 Värmlands län
   

  

**Land** 
 Sverige
   

  

**Referensnummer** 
 2025/75
   

  

**Publicerat** 
 2025-04-22
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdag** 
 2025-05-11
   

  

**Dela länkar**

title: AI Automation Lead
description:
**Sambla Group is a fintech company with a clear goal – to make loans better for all. We need you, your ambition and your skills on our journey. We have become the fast-growing fintech company that we are today - bridging the gap between borrowers and lenders - thanks to all the 300+ amazing people who work here.**
**Our success is the result of the commitment to deliver the best customer journey and consumer finance products in the industry. Our vision is to democratize lending and empower customers to improve their personal finances. Through our well known brands such as Sambla, Advisa, Rahalaitos, Omalaina, Rahoitu and DigiFinans we support customers in consolidating and getting the best terms on their loans.**
 As the AI & Automation Lead at Sambla Group, you will be responsible for spearheading the development and implementation of Generative AI, Intelligent Agents, and Robotic Process Automation (RPA) across our organization. Your role will involve not only technical leadership but also strategic vision to drive AI and automation adoption, maximize business benefits, and foster a culture of innovation.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Identify and develop new use cases for Generative AI products, Intelligent Agents, and RPA solutions within the Sambla Group.
* Execute and build the Gen AI Platform strategy and a platform for the entire group.
* Lead and drive the adoption of various Gen AI solutions, Intelligent Agents, and RPA initiatives across Sambla Group, including developer experience, end-customer solutions, and automation via multi-agent workflows.
* Build, maintain, and lead an Engineering team to develop a robust Gen AI Platform and its use cases.
* Execute scaling mechanisms to transition projects from idea to proof-of-concept/value to production.
* Maintain effective stakeholder management to ensure alignment and support, and effectively communicate complex ideas.
* Design and guide best practices and architectural guidelines for AI model development, testing, deployment, monitoring, and auditing, with a focus on responsible tech.
* Strategize the deployment of AI & Automation to enhance customer experiences, optimize operational efficiencies, and bolster the company's competitive edge.


**Must-Have Requirements**
* Deep demonstrable expertise in AI, particularly in LLM and RPA, with a strong background in data science or engineering.
* Proven track record in leading digital transformation projects and AI product development/deployment.
* Strong knowledge in Generative AI technologies, platforms, and Intelligent Agents.
* Expertise in project management and agile methodologies.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.


 In addition to the must-have requirements, candidates with experience in cloud-based AI solutions, familiarity with data privacy regulations, a background in machine learning and data analytics, and a vision aligned with redefining personal finances through cutting-edge technology will be highly regarded.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* Business in mind & people at heart – we deliver results together and celebrate our achievements.
* A varied and challenging role in a multinational and highly innovative company, where we value the development of our employees
* We are strong believers in creating a fun workplace where people enjoy coming to work.
* A friendly culture with openness and respect for one another, with the possibility to influence and make a difference on society and people’s everyday lives.


 Please note!
   

  

 As part of our efforts to foster an unbiased recruitment process, we kindly encourage you to not include picture, gender, ethnicity, religion, disability, sexual orientation or age in your CV.
   

  

 Sambla Group is the new generation of brokers. Our ambition has always been the same - to challenge the banks’ offers so that our customers, regardless of the conditions, should always have the same opportunity to obtain the best possible loan solution. Sambla Group has grown to over 350 employees, established itself in Sweden, Norway, Finland and Denmark with offices in Sweden, Finland and Denmark.

title: Senior Utvecklare MDM
description:
*Vi söker dig som är en erfaren MDM-utvecklare med djup kompetens inom master data management och en stark vilja att göra skillnad. Brinner du för datakvalitet, robusta lösningar och att ligga i teknikens framkant? Vill du dessutom bli en nyckelspelare i ett team där innovation, samarbete och utveckling står i centrum? Då kan det vara dig vi letar efter!*
**Om jobbet**
 Hos oss får du en roll i att vidareutveckla vår Informatica MDM-plattform och datamodell – i nära samarbete med kravställare, informationsmodellerare och andra nyckelroller inom IT och verksamheten. Du bidrar till både arkitektur, utveckling och integration av nya informationsdomäner, och ser till att våra lösningar är både hållbara och affärsmässigt träffsäkra.
   

  

 I din roll kommer du bland annat att:
   

  

* Utveckla och förvalta lösningar i Informatica MDM, IDQ och ActiveVOS
* Delta i kravarbete, testning och lösningsdesign
* Driva tekniska diskussioner och bidra till vår arkitektoniska roadmap
* Kommunicera med produktleverantörer och andra team inom organisationen
* Automatisera och effektivisera utvecklingen som en del av vår DevOps-resa
* Handleda kollegor och vid behov ta rollen som Tech Lead


 Du ansvarar också för att dokumentation, designprinciper och standarder finns på plats och följs. En spännande roll för dig som vill kombinera teknisk expertis med möjlighet att påverka på riktigt.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Du har djup erfarenhet av master data management och är van vid att arbeta med Informatica MDM Hub – både när det gäller konfiguration, datamodellering och utveckling av matchningslogik. Du har byggt Data Access-lager och har förståelse för hur man gör information lättillgänglig och användbar.
   

  

 För att bli framgångsrik i denna roll ser vi gärna att du har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Informatica MDM360 och IDQ
* Java, SQL Server och Message Queues
* Testautomatiseringsverktyg
* Integration med synkrona och asynkrona mönster
* Bank- och/eller försäkringsbranschen (meriterande)
* Du är strukturerad, självgående och lösningsorienterad. Du trivs i agila team, delar gärna med dig av din kunskap och har ett helhetsperspektiv i allt du gör. Kommunikation på svenska och/eller engelska fungerar lika bra för dig – i både tal och skrift.


 Du gillar att jobba med tydliga standarder och principer, men är inte rädd att tänka nytt när det behövs. Framför allt har du ett genuint intresse för datakvalitet och en vilja att bygga system som verkligen gör skillnad.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Bli en del av vårt expertteam inom Data & AI och var med och forma framtidens datadrivna lösningar! Vi ansvarar för några av Länsförsäkringars mest centrala applikationer och står inför spännande förändringar med fokus på moderna lösningar och beslutsstöd – en perfekt chans för dig att påverka och utvecklas.
   

  

 Välkommen till Digital & IT på Länsförsäkringar AB, där vi ligger i framkant av vår teknologiska utveckling. Vi levererar innovativa lösningar som driver verksamheten framåt och skapar en säker och skalbar IT-miljö som ger våra affärsenheter nya möjligheter.Jag, Daniel Björklund, är din närmaste chef och tror på värderingsstyrt ledarskap, där dialog, tillit och respekt är kärnan. Här får du ett öppet klimat och möjligheten att tillsammans med oss driva både verksamheten och tekniken framåt.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-05-13**

title: Archer GRC Developer
description:
**Job Description:** 




 We are seeking a skilled Archer GRC Developer with hands-on experience in designing, developing, and maintaining RSA Archer solutions. The ideal candidate will bring deep technical expertise and a solid understanding of GRC frameworks to drive business-aligned compliance and risk management initiatives.
 



**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Develop and customize RSA Archer applications, dashboards, workflows, and data feeds.
* Translate business needs into technical solutions within the Archer platform.
* Manage system upgrades, patches, and performance tuning.
* Integrate Archer with third-party tools via APIs and connectors.
* Implement GRC best practices (NIST, ISO 27001, SOC, PCI-DSS, SOX).
* Provide ongoing support and troubleshooting for Archer applications.



**Required Skills:** 



* 6+ years in Archer development and administration (v6.x).
* Expertise in Archer ODA, custom objects, data feeds, and workflows.
* Proficient in SQL, JavaScript, XML, REST/SOAP APIs.
* Strong knowledge of GRC processes and security compliance frameworks.
* Experience with SSO, SAML, LDAP, and RBAC.



**Preferred:** 



* RSA Archer Certified (ACP/Admin) preferred.
* Agile experience (JIRA, Confluence).
* Knowledge of Archer cloud deployments (AWS/Azure/GCP).

title: Fullstack-utvecklare (C# .NET MVC)
description:
Som utvecklare hos kunden blir du en nyckelspelare i ett dynamiskt team där du får arbeta nära verksamhetens intressenter, arkitekter och andra utvecklare. Du kommer att vara involverad i hela utvecklingsprocessen - från kravanalys och design till implementation och förvaltning av kundens e-handelslösningar.
   

  

**För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har:**
